message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and features, I'm asking for $15,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe we can reach a more agreeable price. My counteroffer for the product is $10,000.
Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective on the price.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000? This reflects the true value of the product.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the current market and my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $12,500 for the product.
